import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const importAll=r=>r.keys().map(r);const images=importAll(require.context("../assets/gallery",false,/\.(png|jpe?g|svg)$/));function Gallery(){const[lightboxIndex,setLightboxIndex]=useState(null);const openLightbox=index=>{setLightboxIndex(index);};const closeLightbox=()=>{setLightboxIndex(null);};const prevImage=()=>{setLightboxIndex(prev=>prev===0?images.length-1:prev-1);};const nextImage=()=>{setLightboxIndex(prev=>prev===images.length-1?0:prev+1);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"gallery-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"outer-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Galleri"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Bilder fr\xE5n v\xE5ra medlemmar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"inner-card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"gallery-grid",children:images.map((img,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"gallery-item",onClick:()=>openLightbox(index),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:img,alt:"Galleri ".concat(index+1)})},index))})})]}),lightboxIndex!==null&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"lightbox",onClick:closeLightbox,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"close",children:"\xD7"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"lightbox-content",src:images[lightboxIndex],alt:"Galleri ".concat(lightboxIndex+1)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"prev",onClick:e=>{e.stopPropagation();prevImage();},children:"\u276E"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"next",onClick:e=>{e.stopPropagation();nextImage();},children:"\u276F"})]})]});}export default Gallery;
